abstract: Fashion blogger David Tripp pleads guilty to 13 counts of identity theft, attempted identity theft and forgery for using stolen credit card numbers to buy expensive clothing, claiming purchases were on behalf of actor Johnny Depp and musician Brandon Flowers; agrees to pay total of  $50,037.50 to defrauded boutiques in year's time or face prison.
lead_paragraph: The blogger, David Tripp, bought clothing in Manhattan boutiques, purportedly for celebrities, and pleaded guilty to 13 counts of identity theft and forgery, and agreed to pay $50,000 to the stores.

headline.main: Fashion Blogger Who Claimed Tie to Johnny Depp Accepts Plea Deal
headline.print_headline: Man Claiming Link to Stars Pleads Guilty to Identity Theft

snippet: The blogger, David Tripp, bought clothing in Manhattan boutiques, purportedly for celebrities, and pleaded guilty to 13 counts of identity theft and forgery, and agreed to pay $50,000 to the stores.
